remarks: Properties that determine a pre-Hilbert (inner product) space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
isphld.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` W ) ) $.
isphld.a $e |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` W ) ) $.
isphld.s $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( .s ` W ) ) $.
isphld.i $e |- ( ph -> I = ( .i ` W ) ) $.
isphld.z $e |- ( ph -> .0. = ( 0g ` W ) ) $.
isphld.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( Scalar ` W ) ) $.
isphld.k $e |- ( ph -> K = ( Base ` F ) ) $.
isphld.p $e |- ( ph -> .+^ = ( +g ` F ) ) $.
isphld.t $e |- ( ph -> .X. = ( .r ` F ) ) $.
isphld.c $e |- ( ph -> .* = ( *r ` F ) ) $.
isphld.o $e |- ( ph -> O = ( 0g ` F ) ) $.
isphld.l $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
isphld.r $e |- ( ph -> F e. *Ring ) $.
isphld.cl $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. V /\ y e. V ) -> ( x I y ) e. K ) $.
isphld.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ q e. K /\ ( x e. V /\ y e. V /\ z e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( q .x. x ) .+ y ) I z ) = ( ( q .X. ( x I z ) ) .+^ ( y I z ) ) ) $.
isphld.ns $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. V /\ ( x I x ) = O ) -> x = .0. ) $.
isphld.cj $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. V /\ y e. V ) -> ( .* ` ( x I y ) ) = ( y I x ) ) $.
isphld $p |- ( ph -> W e. PreHil ) $.
$d W q x y z $.
$d ph q x y z $.
